analysis.description: IPDealToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/2/0xc86a3ac9a4997926631e658e63235ec8b526c97f.sol#315-321) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0xc86a3ac9a4997926631e658e63235ec8b526c97f.sol:
	Contract IPDealToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0xc86a3ac9a4997926631e658e63235ec8b526c97f.sol#167)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

IPDealToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/2/0xc86a3ac9a4997926631e658e63235ec8b526c97f.sol#291-295) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/2/0xc86a3ac9a4997926631e658e63235ec8b526c97f.sol#294)

IPDealToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/2/0xc86a3ac9a4997926631e658e63235ec8b526c97f.sol#315-321)
	- /unique_chucks/2/0xc86a3ac9a4997926631e658e63235ec8b526c97f.sol#320-321
IPDealToken.MONTH should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0xc86a3ac9a4997926631e658e63235ec8b526c97f.sol#119-120)
